description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' basic attacks deal {{pp|7|4 to 10|1;3;6;9;11;14;17}} {{as|(+ {{pp|5|changedisplay=true|1 to 5|1;4 to 16}} per Plasma stack)|buzzword}} {{as|(+ {{pp|5|key=%|type=Plasma stacks|changedisplay=true|10 to 20|0 to 4}} AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.

{{sbc|Caustic Wounds:}} '''Kai'Sa's''' [[basic attack]]s, {{ai|Void Seeker|Kai'Sa}}, and nearby allies' {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effects mark enemies with {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} for 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. '''Kai'Sa's''' attacks can then rupture enemies with {{as|4 Plasma|buzzword}}, consuming them to deal {{as|15% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''missing''' health}} {{as|magic damage}}, capped at 400 against monsters.

{{sbc|Living Weapon:}} When reaching a certain amount of stat from {{tt|items|Does not include item buffs (e.g. Guinsoo's Rageblade's or Ardent Censer's).}} and {{tt|stat growth|Includes all stats gained when leveling (including base AD gained), but does not include stats at level 1.}}, '''Kai'Sa''' can evolve the related [[champion ability|basic ability]]. This has a channel time of 2 seconds, and the upgrade is canceled if the said amount of stat isn't reached anymore.
i1.name: Second Skin
notes: * {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} which exceed the 5th stack are applied normally.
* Stats from runes do not count toward the minimum requirement to upgrade a [[champion ability|basic ability]].

description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.5}}-second delay, '''Kai'Sa''' fires a Void blast in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds and applying {{as|2 Plasma|buzzword}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Second Skin|Kai'Sa|Living Weapon}}:}} Requires {{sti|{{as|100 ability power}}}} to upgrade â€“ ''Void Seeker'' applies {{as|3 Plasma|buzzword}} and refunds 50% of the {{sti|cooldown}} against {{tip|champions}}.
w1.name: Void Seeker
notes: * If the stacks detonate {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}, any remaining stacks are reapplied afterwards.
* ''Void Seeker'' also deals ''Second Skin's'' damage based on {{as|Plasma|buzzword}} stacks on the target.

** This increases the base damage by ''Second Skin's'' base damage, and further increased by at least {{as|{{fd|22.5}}% AP}} ({{tt|10%|0 stack Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|{{fd|12.5}}%|1 stack Plasma AP ratio}}), and up to {{as|{{fd|37.5}}% AP}} ({{tt|{{fd|17.5}}%|3 stacks Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|20%|4 stacks Plasma AP ratio}}).

** When evolved, the AP ratio increases by at least {{as|{{fd|37.5}}% AP}} ({{tt|10%|0 stack Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|{{fd|12.5}}%|1 stack Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|15%|2 stacks Plasma AP ratio}}), and up to {{as|{{fd|52.5}}% AP}} ({{tt|15%|2 stacks Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|{{fd|17.5}}%|3 stacks Plasma AP ratio}} + {{tt|20%|4 stacks Plasma AP ratio}}).

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kai'Sa''' {{tip|shields}} herself and {{tip|dashes}} to a target location near an enemy champion {{tt|recently affected by {{as|Plasma|buzzword}}|about 4 seconds if ruptured}}. The shield holds for 2 seconds upon arrival.
r1.name: Killer Instinct
notes: * Kai'Sa will move to the casting location regardless of whether she can dash.
